text: Preheat the oven to 325 °F (163 °C). Lightly coat a rimmed baking sheet with cooking spray or use parchment paper if preferred. Stir together oats, almonds, pecans, cherries, cranberries, cinnamon, and salt in a large bowl. Set aside. Combine oil, honey, and sugar in a small saucepan. Bring to a boil and remove the resulting syrup from the heat. Stir in vanilla. Drizzle the syrup over the oat mixture; toss together with a wooden spoon.  Pour the granola onto the baking sheet and spread evenly. Bake, stirring occasionally, until golden (about 25 minutes). Let the granola cool completely on a wire rack. Break it into chunks and store in an airtight container. Finished.
